channel.title: AssualtX All Sorted -- [ 562 ] --
channel.description:
Hi Moparscape im new to the whole concept of rsps community forums although I have had experience on rsps's I've coded and edited servers so I know how to get a server running.
Lets cut to the chase.
Hoster: how to apply: [code]Name: msn: Time Hosting/Time you can host: about you: [/code]<<<Last position avaliable<<<
[IMG]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/8997/banneryna.png[/img]
[size=36pt]Goals:[/size] The goal of this server is to become really succesful with alot of people and hopefully making new online freinds.
[size=36pt]Server Information:[/size]
The base I am using for this project is painzone 562 - All Skills Working! - Amazing fight pits. - Amazing Stability - Skillcape Emotes - Skilling area - All spirit shields working perfectly with effect - Donator Zone/Area/Shops - Dragon Claws perfect - Armadyl boss working perfectly - Bandos Boss working perfectly - Saradomin Boss working perfectly - Zamorak boss working perfectly - Awesome Starter - Clan Chat with toggeling + deleting clan - PVP drops - 100% Working clue scrolls - PVP armour - 100% working char equip
[size=36pt]Things to be added:[/size]
-634 items -634 gameframe -Quests -dungeoneering taking all ideas...
[size=36pt]Media:[/size]
Pest Control: [img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/565/pestcontrolw.png[/img] [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/565/pestcontrolw.png[/img] Bounty Hunter: [img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/6446/bountyhunterr.png[/img] Char Equip: [img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/9039/charequip.png[/img] Home: [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/8802/homeea.png[/img] Some Skills: [img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/128/skillsl.png[/img] Summoning: [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/526/summoning.png[/img] [img]http://img859.imageshack.us/img859/5057/summoningshop.png[/img] Hunting: [img]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/1899/huntingf.png[/img] [img]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/354/huntingshop.png[/img] Farming: [img]http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/4571/farmingv.png[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/1404/farmingseeds.png[/img] RuneCrafting: [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/3222/runecrafting.png[/img]
NPC's: Tormented Demon: [img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/2926/tormenteddrop.png[/img] Skeletal Horror: [img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/5143/skelef.png[/img] Penance Queen: Custom map not custom sorry for that [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/2306/79395490.png[/img] Damis: [img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/2782/damis.png[/img] Phoenix: [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4845/phoenixv.png[/img] Elites: [img]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/3281/elitesl.png[/img] Nezi: [img]http://img859.imageshack.us/img859/7396/nezi.png[/img]
Still much more media coming!
[size=36pt]Positions Availiable and how to Apply[/size]
Hoster: how to apply: [code]Name: msn: Time Hosting/Time you can host: about you: [/code]

item.dc:creator: @man1412 man1412
item.description:
@man1412 wrote:

[quote=“AssualtX, post:38, topic:391740”][quote author=man1412 link=topic=488904.msg3586546#msg3586546 date=1304221421]
Name: Chase
MSN: chaserulz0423@hotmail.com
Proof of Work: I unfortunately cant show any of my work, Because I just recently got a new laptop and I couldn’t back up any of my shit cause some stupid hacker gave me a crap ton of virus’s… So I am having to restart new on my laptop.
About You: I am 18 and I actually do love coding servers and working on web pages. I have learned most of the things my mom knows cause she is a huge web designer for her friends and her friends business’s. The only thing right now I cant buy VBulletin which I love and do a website on that. So I have to start off with a free website and do all my work on that and build a homepage and downloads and votes and ETC. But if you want to know more just email me.
[/quote]Sorry mate about your laptop ut ughh ill add u ASAP but right now im off to bed GN.[/quote]

Alright, I mean I guess I can ask my mom if she can be a backup? Cause she knows its something I love… And just add me on MSN chaserulz0423@hotmail.com

Read full topic
